level.heading: Certain representations prohibited.
level.text: Unless licensed in accordance with this subchapter, no person shall use the words or terms "air conditioning mechanic," "refrigeration mechanic," "licensed air conditioning mechanic," "licensed refrigeration mechanic," "master mechanic," or any combination of those words to imply that the person is licensed to perform the services of a refrigeration and air conditioning mechanic in the District.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-261
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 47-2801.
